name: The Ultimate Words within words that start with SL Quiz |  Word Play

questions.text:
The question layout is as described below:

SL + A clue for the 'word within the word' = A clue for the combined word. 

The answer is the combined word.

SL + The remains of burnt wood = A cut or gouge.
SL + Frozen water = A piece or a segment of a fruit.
SL + A rim or brink = A device used for descending snow-covered hills.
SL + Abdominal muscles = Tiles used to make up stone flooring.
SL + One who brings something to a conclusion = A description of someone who is thin and frail.
SL + Cartridge pen fluid = To move in a secretive manner.
SL + A small sociable insect = The incline of a plane.
SL + The personal form of the verb 'be' = To close a door noisily.
SL + Consumed food = A metamorphic rock used for roof tiles.
SL + To have been indebted = Reduced in speed.
